a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, MOV and most common video formats. The output is always MP4 (H.264) for maximum compatibility across devices and platforms.
q2: How much can the file size be reduced?
a2: Results vary depending on the original video. Typically you can expect 30-70% size reduction at medium quality. Higher quality preserves more detail with less compression.
a3: The tool offers three quality levels. High quality preserves most detail, medium offers a good balance, and low creates the smallest files. You choose the best tradeoff for your needs.
